title: ICT police honour retiring officer with farewell ceremony
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 08 (APP):Islamabad Capital Territory (ICT) Police on Tuesday organized a farewell ceremony in honour of Muhammad Nawaz, an official of the Security Division, to acknowledge his services.
According to a police statement, the event was attended by SSP Security, Capt (R) Zeeshan Haider, who graced the ceremony as the chief guest, along with other senior police officers.
He said the ceremony was held in recognition of the valuable contributions made by the retiring officer during his service. Speaking on the occasion, SSP Zeeshan Haider said that retirement is a natural part of the service, and every officer who joins must eventually retire.
SSP further advised the serving officers to perform their duties with dedication to earn respect for the police department. “Public service is the key to gaining a good reputation for both the officer and the institution,” he said.
The chief guest praised Muhammad Nawaz for his dedicated service and presented him with a police shield and gifts as a token of appreciation, expressing his best wishes for the retiring officer’s future endeavors.
